thread.title: Cavs waive four players, roster down to 16
thread.title_full: Cavs waive four players, roster down to 16

author: newsnet5.com staff
title: Cavs waive four players, roster down to 16
text:
Guard Dionte Christmas Forward Jack Cooley 
The announcement was made by General Manager David Griffin on Friday from Cleveland Clinic Courts. The Cavs roster is now down to 16 players. 
Daye appeared in six preseason games for the Cavs, averaging 5 points per game. 
Stephens appeared in four preseason games and averaged 3.3 points per game. 
Christmas appeared in four preseason games and averaged 6.8 points per game. 
Cooley appeared in two games and averaged 4.5 points per game.
